agents.name: ags-mro-agent
agents.display_description: Monitor, analyze and improve MRO & Reliability operations across sites and airlines.
agents.chat_subtitle: Start a conversation to analyze Thales MRO & Reliability operations and metrics accross sites & fleets.

tools.display_description: Weekly metrics per repair site, airline and part number family. Including AOG hours, TAT days, SLA risk scores, and more.
Projections on AOG hours and percentage of repairs completed within SLAs, according to changes in PN stock changes and/or or TAT reduction, per repair site.
Previous repair notes and failure analysis from reliability teams.
Python code generation and execution. The agent will use this whenever is relevant to the user query. All code will run in an isolated environment.

agents.name: databricks_general_agent
agents.display_description: Versatile agent for everyday tasks and general queries related to AGS
agents.chat_subtitle: Ask me (almost) anything about your day-to-day work and general queries.

tools.display_description: Company Intranet & onboarding documents to help answer your day-to-day questions.
